website_summaries.verdict: Made from polycarbonate with aluminum material and smart functionality.
pros: Holds up against the tests of long-term travel, maintaining fit and form
We love the extra pocket designs to fit not just work-related electronics but those needed for grooming purposes as well
High marks for ease of use pulling around in airports

customer_reviews.title: So light and sturdy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this carryon. I owned many Tumi carryon but it’s just too heavy for international travel. I took this carryon to Asia and 5 business trips in US, so far no problem. I bought the white color, so far little scuff marks here and there, I was able to wipe it off. What sold me was the front zip pocket for easy access documents and iPad etc.. this would have been even better if it could expand. I hope one day they will come out with the expendable version, even higher cost I would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lonie D

customer_reviews.title: Great for regular use / abuse - High quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suitcase that will fit the latest carry-on restrictions. I really like the closure system and would have kept this suitcase if... The only issue I had was that the front flap is not deep enough into the interior. I wanted to use this bag like my Brookstone Dash Pro for my CPAP in the front pocket. If it weren't for this on personal use issue, this suitcase is fantastic. For the typical business traveler, this would be an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shuey

customer_reviews.title: Love this carryon
customer_reviews.text: Love this carryon! It's stylish and functional. I've used it on three work trips so far and it's been a dream. During my last trip, I managed to pack two pairs of pumps, one pair of flats, two pant suits, one skirt suit, one pair of jeans, one sweater, pajamas and toiletries for a 4 night work trip. I also used the front for my laptop. Held everything perfectly!!! If you're having second thoughts, you should definitely buy it. I travel a lot and have purchased six or seven carryons over the last 10 years and this is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: The inside of this bad is awesome
customer_reviews.text: 1 year in, 5 round trip flights and 5 stars for sure. The White does mark up but everything has buffed off and scratches/scuffs do not show really. The inside of this bad is awesome, don't change a thing. When we bought it was $200, not sure if I'd go with the White at the same price as the Black, tough call given I haven't see both. We have 2 of these bags, each in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: SarahM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, unique, carry-on travel case
customer_reviews.text: I love my Enkloze suitcase! It's everything a (legit) business traveler needs...Space, ease of packing, and no frills to increase the price. Plus, I love the shell/color. I've traveled three times with this, and have gotten compliments every time. The best has been when the flight attendant said, "That case is too big, it won't fit overhead."...and then it fits, to which she replied, "Wow! It looks too big to fit, but I guess it does!" I *highly* recommend not only this case, but Enkloze in general.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ochs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hard case carryon!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hard-case carry-on with a front pocket for a laptop, because otherwise I always have to carry my laptop in my purse, which gets really heavy. After trying several hard cases, this one was definitely the best. It is super sturdy, the locking mechanism is great - you don't have to zip a big long zipper all along the outside of the case. And the laptop pocket is roomy enough for my 13" Macbook and an ipad. Also plenty of organizers and belting inside the case to keep all your clothes tidy. Very thoughtfully made. I'm getting 2 more like this, so our family can have a matching set!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Maheshwari

customer_reviews.title: Most reliable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year since I bought this suitcase as a present for my husband's birthday. We are not even a bit disappointed. It's by far the most comfortable, reliable and stylish piece of luggage we have owned so far. We have never checked it in, so I can't tell if it's sturdy enough to withstand all blows and throws the luggage have to go through... But wheels still work perfectly, even though we traveled to different terrains, often by foot.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Carry on with style and substance.
customer_reviews.text: A great carry on. The body feels sturdy, wheels are smooth and quiet, and the interior has enough room for a weekend trip (maybe more). My only complaint, and probably whats costing this a 5 star, is that the pull rod handle feels flimsy. It does the job, but I worry one wrong twist of the bag and the handle will break off. Still, a great carry on.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The perfect marriage of fashion and function
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like....if I had to nit-pick, I would say that it's not expandable like other hard-side spinners. But what I like better is additional storage on its exterior, which allows you to stuff it after its been weighed. Other than that, this luggage flat out rocks. Awesome looks, lightweight, aluminum frame, TSA locks, reinforced corners for durability, solid warranty. So good I just its bigger brother the X1.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Brown Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely happy with my new carbon black Enkloze
customer_reviews.text: I travel just about every week on a plane and was looking for a new carry-on. I'm extremely happy with my new carbon black Enkloze. It is very light weight, extremely easy to wheel around and I really like the flexibility the small external pocket on the front provides. I had to contact customer support for a slight issue and they were extremely responsive and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Light and very maneuverable!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light...seems well built...moves great...first time I used it the airline put a huge dent in the top corner 😩 (still works great tho)
customer_reviews.author: Skoggie

customer_reviews.title: Great carry-on bag
customer_reviews.text: Great carry-on bag. Fits easily in overhead compartments. Plenty of internal room and protects contents well. Very good casters - rolls easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bechtol

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great service. Excellent packaging quality. Very happy with purchase. Would highly recommend you check these guys out.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good but some limitations
customer_reviews.text: I intended to use this as a carry-on but it becoms too heavy on international flights. It was very protective in rain, and the spinners are well done. It can a little tight on space since the laptop section folds into the main compartment. It did keep my suit and shirts relatively unwrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Shreekant Vattikuti

customer_reviews.title: Love my bag
customer_reviews.text: Coolest looking bag I have ever owned. I had a slight issue, called the company, and they took care of it immediately. Love my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lupinacci Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have had over a year and over 40 trips with it for business. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm all around really happy with the purchase. It's designed well, with perfect dimensions for a carry on, and its compartments are great for organizing my travel goods.
customer_reviews.author: UMNJustin

customer_reviews.title: great luggage. I"ve taken 2 trips with this bag ...
customer_reviews.text: great luggage. I"ve taken 2 trips with this bag and it's worked out great. first trip I carried on and checked it on the other. easy to haul and carry
customer_reviews.author: C. Holt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great carryon. The size is perfect for 2-4 days
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carryon. The size is perfect for 2-4 days. The ONLY issue is that there is no side handle for lifting into overhead bins.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Construction Materials. Good Design, Poor Execution
customer_reviews.text: Cheap materials. Locks, hinges, handles, interior partition clips are flimsy. Frame bends when open. Not worth half the price. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: phoebe`1

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for a year and still look brand new. Great quality. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Testa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Just as described. Exceptionally well built and great looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ataxlady99

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, fit and finish!!  But, quickly tarnished.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, fit and finish. Seems like a very nice bag. Look forward to traveling with it in the upcoming weeks. Update: the exterior finish is easily scratched. One trip, as a carry-on, didn't even survive the car rental shuttle bus luggage shelving. Don't expect this case to keep its beautiful looks, unless you leave it at home and show it your traveling photos later upon return.
customer_reviews.author: Backnthaday

customer_reviews.title: not much bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this suitcase and it certainly has some nice features. The wheels are silent and the pocket is groovy but ... As you are loading items into the outer pocket smaller things can fall through the gaps in the nylon and it just simply isn't worth the asking price. I think it is "pretty" at best and really overpriced at worst. I wish I had saved nearly $100 and bought the Delsey bag with the external pocket. Having a handle ONLY on the top is infuriating too.
customer_reviews.author: Silent Music Photography

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Zipper lock broken on first trip want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great form and function with easy access to laptop
customer_reviews.text: I really like the styling and easy laptop access feature. The product arrived with a missing zipper and the combo lock zipper broke off some time after. Contacted support and they took care of it pretty quickly. Thank you Enkloze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Received my bag today! I absolutely love it! I really like the design and the color. The wheels spin real good. It's light weighted. I can't wait to take it with me my next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Usagi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my wife and me. We trave often. First flight at baggage claim I find bag had popped open, been packing taped shut and has a deep 3" dimple in a corner. Haven't taken the other one out of its protective cloth bag but would like to send them both back. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mainelover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Price is what gave it 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Price is what gave it 4 stars. If this was $100 less it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Carryon Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. Not only will it last way longer than the other cheaper bags I've had, but just the ease of the way it glides (4 wheels) and the solid case make it easily transportable through airports. It's the perfect size for an overhead bin, giving you plenty of compartments and packing space on the inside. The hard enclosed laptop pocket on the outside of the bag makes for easy access when going through TSA or to pull it out before you thrown it in the overhead bin.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: I always get stopped and get asked - what is that brand of luggage?
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this on so many trips (somewhere in between 50-100), and it is basically in the same condition as when purchased - and it has definitely been thrown around. Functionality (5/5) - separate compartments inside AND separate compartment outside Look (5/5) - I always get stopped...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than my Rimowa
customer_reviews.text: I have this, Rimowa, and Briggs for carry on luggage. I have to say Enkloze is the most light weighted, easiest to roll on, and most stylish out of the three. Most importantly, it fits so much more than the other two. This is the only carry on I use now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great carryon
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this bag almost 3 years & it has been more than I hoped for. If it ever wears out, I will definitely purchase another one. I did get it on sale at $200.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: The best Carry On luggage I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it's a great luggage! The zippers, lock, handle, pocket, wheels, everything is high quality. And the carbon fiber and aluminum make it look very fancy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Baldyr

customer_reviews.title: The suitcase itself is beautiful. It's very light and solid
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase itself is beautiful. It's very light and solid. The locks are solid and latches (slide down) are very smooth. The wheels are very nimble and easy to maneuver. It's spacious inside. Overall, it's a solid carrier. I did notice that the blemishes are noticeable, but I guess that's what I get for choosing a white carrier. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A frequent traveler's perfect carry-on
customer_reviews.text: I'm a person who flies more than 4x a month and is always in search of a perfect carry-on. My search has ended with enkloze! Beautifully and stylishly designed and love the compartments that fit both my business and personal travel needs. The rolling motion is smooth and seamless. The product is easy to use and makes sense in every way imaginable. I love that the main compartment is closes without the need of a zipper. I cannot count how many bags I've thrown away due to the zipper breaking! I normally don't write reviews, but I was so pleased with this product that I felt obligated to provide a review! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: SANG K LEE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loving my carry on suitcase. It really stands out! My favorite part of the suitcase is the easy to unzip laptop section which is also TSA friendly.
customer_reviews.author: WLEE1212

customer_reviews.title: stylish and sturdy luggage as my needs and this piece fits all ...
customer_reviews.text: As a regular traveler, I need a compact, stylish and sturdy luggage as my needs and this piece fits all three. There is enough capacity for a long weekend trip and the compartments inside are useful. The outer cover is sturdy and can stand up to the rigors of travel. I especially love the stylish white exterior. This carry on looks much more expensive than it is. Overall it's well made and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jie Shi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This carryon has a great overall design--I ordered the white and looks great in person. It has a lot of useful compartments and more lightweight than I was expecting. The material used for the compartments inside feels pretty sturdy. Impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa U

customer_reviews.title: My favorite carry on
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for business travel. This luggage is functional and offers maximum protection without sacrificing aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality, got everything I wanted in a suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a five star product, stylish, user friendly, lightweight, excellent quality, got everything I wanted in a suitcase, LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and convenient to travel with. I'm also very happy with its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Chae

product_meta.title: Enkloze X1 Carbon Carry-On 21" Spinner 100% PC TSA Approved Front Loading Zipperless
feature_bullets: Superior Durability: Made from 100% Polycarbonate with Aluminum Frame and Aluminum Reinforced Corners this carry on will handle all international airline carry on restrictions

Unique Functionality: Speed through security with the Quick Access Front Loading Laptop Compartment for easy access through security (allows up to 15.6" laptop) and interior organization for airline tickets, passports, ID, etc.

Secure Zipperless Access: The X1 features a zipperless (1) TSA Approved Key Lock for the Main Compartment (two keys provided) just in case you need to check in your carryon or for additional security. Also interior X-bands and pockets keep your valuables safe and secure
Stylish Spinner Mobility: Set on (4) Ultra Quiet Hinomoto (Japan) Wheels and a Carbon Fibre Design, cruise through the airport in style
Maximum Comfort: The X1 utilizes a strong aluminum Multi Stage Height Adjustable Pull Rod for Extra Bag Support. Overall Dimension: 21.3 x 14.6 x 9.4 (Inches), Weight: 8.16 lbs
